name: NITO The Norwegian assosiation for Biomedical Laboratory Scientists
membership: European Association for Professions in Biomedical Science, EPBS. www.epbs.net.
goal: A professional assosiation for Biomedical Laboratory Scientists. Working for the professional and ethical standard for Biomedical Laboratory Scientists. Working for the authorisation, competence and the professional role for Biomedical Laboratory Scientists in the Health system.
interests: Education, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: We are members of ESCO and participate in the Social Dialoge
